channel.title: Which would be best to start off with?
channel.description:
I'm looking to restart up my servers but I wanna change the source type.
I figured it would be pointless for the newer server revisions and wanted to stay in the 317s to Delta, to 508's and possibly 530's.
So my question is really cuz im more interested in teh 530's,
Which would be a great base to start from. One preferably with all skills working and loose items except 3 on death and what not cuz i wanna base it economy based, and i think not loosing items on death is pointless.

item.title: Which would be best to start off with?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:

Doobage:

alright both chill out,

I raged at you?

Read full topic

item.title: Which would be best to start off with?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

This is another example of why I don’t answer people who ask for help very often. Instead of asking for a source with loads of requirements to fit your needs, you should create the requirements in the source to make that fit your needs. That’s why I gave you the really big index, that’s why he told you to do that. If you’re not bothering to put some effort into it then there’s no point in hosting a server.

Read full topic
item.source: Which would be best to start off with?

item.title: Which would be best to start off with?
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

alright both chill out,

I’ve ran a server for a While, However i feel like i would save time coding around the content “I WANT TO ADD” and stuff I make up, on a source where I don’t have to worry about 90% of it not even working, Thats why i asked what is best to start off with. I dont need guides on how to java code or any of that. Please stick to the question and not send me information that has nothing to do with what im asking for.

Read full topic
item.source: Which would be best to start off with?
